Title: Relates to the prevention of discrimination
Summary: Relates to the prevention of discrimination; replaces the term "sexual harassment" with "discrimination".
LawCode: Amd §139-l, St Fin L; amd §§7515 & 5003-b, CPLR; amd §§17-a & 18-a, Pub Off L; amd §5-336, Gen Ob L; amd §201-g, Lab L; amd part KK subpart E §2, Chap 57 of 2018; amd §§296-d, 292 & 63, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the civil practice law and rules, the public officers law, the general obligations law, the labor law and the executive law, in relation to discrimination; and to amend subpart E of part KK of chapter 57 of the laws of 2018, amending the labor law, relating to the establishment of a model policy regarding the prevention of sexual harassment and a model training program to prevent sexual harassment in the workplace, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
